name: Tara
text: Dr Gafford aka Dr Beautiful is extremely well informed in the latest skincare products and technology.  She took the time to listen and to fully explain products and procedures to me.  I highly recommend her services if you are looking for a skincare doctor who is knowledgeable, doesn't rush or pressure you and maintains a friendly, helpful staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to have you as a patient! Stop by anytime M-F, 9-5 and pick up a free sample on us!

name: Becky Mink
text:
Love this place!  Always a pleasant experience!
Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a skincare specialist.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are so pleased to have you as a patient! Stop in anytime M-F, 9-5, and I have a free goodie for you! Thanks again!

name: Anthony Gracia
text: Very pleasant and courteous staff

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Don't know where to start. Most people like this place, but don't go if you don't know what you want. I told them my symptoms (and meds) and was pushed to buy 2 products. Got home to research and both items interfered with my medications. Taking items back is like you broke some major rule. It is frowned upon. Not that they care, but I won't be back.

resp.text:
Jeanna, I am so sorry about your experience, and I hope that you will change your mind and give us another chance. Our employees are not allowed to give medical advice. Our policy is to tell you to talk to your pharmacist about possible interactions. That being said, the internet is NOT a good place to research that information. I implore you to ask your pharmacist.

As for feeling frowned upon for a return, please understand that we are human and are capable of allowing our emotions to show on our sleeve as much as anyone, but I will talk to the employee that assisted you and let her know that she made you feel badly.

Again, I apologize for your experience and hope that you will give us a chance to make it right.

name: SincerlyTee
text: I love this place! The smoothies are my favorite!!!!! Also very clean environment!

name: Captain Fereday
text: Good people and good selection. I recommend Spirulina and Cacao  ;)

name: Brandy Phillips
text: This is such a friendly place and everyone is always so helpful with all my questions.  I highly recommend them and they always have everything I am looking for.

resp.text: You are so sweet, Brandy! Thank you so much! We LOVE our job, and people like you remind us why we're here!

name: Haygood Farms
text: Great store very friendly staff highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you, so much!!

name: Cristin Meyer
text: Great selection. Usually I have to drive to larger cities to find my favorite brands. My smoothie was great, but I would like to see more organic food added. The staff kindly guided me to the nearest store selling organic foods (Kroger) in Decatur.

name: Bonnie Goodman
text: Always very helpful and nice.

name: Blakley Boyette
text: Amazing service & good prices, I would a 100% recommend this store!!

name: Alisha Black
text: Wonderful informative employees

name: kris boddicker
text: Nice people. Relaxing atmosphere. Will come back.

name: Kathleen Jackson
text: Amazing amazing and AMAZING I can't wait to go back awesome for people who suffer from neck and back pain

resp.text: We really appreciate that feedback.

name: Kenny Duckett
text: Best massage I ever been to and the only one I will ever go

resp.text: We really appreciate those kind words! Thank you!

name: Ruth Lu
text: I did the massage today for my shoulder pain and lower back pain. They provided a very good service. After an hour massage, I felt sooooo relaxed. My daughter also did the message and she loves the hot stones. HIghly recommend this place.

name: Alley
text: It was great!  The hot stones were awesome.  Nice,  quite and clean place. She gave an excellent massage. Recommended! Thank you!

name: Tami Newcomb
text: I'm thrilled with the massage I NEEDED today for lower back pain. Although they were somewhat busy, they were able to take me as a walk-in right away for an hour massage!  Woo hoo!  The hot stones were an amazing surprise as was the complimentary bottle of water as I was leaving.  I love this place!  They offer soooo many services, too.

name: Elizabeth Bowles
text: Did not get a good massage the other day from the Male that works there so I called today to make an appointment with a female. They said okay, no problem. I get there a few minutes before my appointment time and they confirmed "you want a female, right?" I told them yes and then they said they couldnt do my appointment time. Very dissatisfied with this. Will not be going back.

name: Mike Morris
text: Great massage. Was great at working on problem areas. Very warm and friendly.

name: steven chamberlain
text: They do a good job and you actually get a 60 minute massage when you pay for an hour.

name: jess mathis
text: I always received nice customer service and they do a good job.

name: Kim Steakley
text: Clean,quite and get full attention to address your needs!

name: Cin Drake
text: you all need to call me I am in pain due to your male person who gave me a massage

name: Jennifer Hunt
text: Most amazing couple's massage that my husband and I have ever had!!!!! Highly recommend!!!!

name: J C
text: This business has been recently closed.

name: Sabas Ck
text: Clean and nice stuff

name: Sabasi Kimaro
text: Liked it

name: Brian Lucas
text: Best massage in town. The rooms are clean, they pay attention to you and really give a great massage. The girls there are legit and really know their craft. A+ . I would not visit another massage store in Huntsville after going here.

name: Hope G
text: I got a massage today by Michelle I think her name was. She was so polite and friendly. She also made me feel extremely comfortable and the massage was amazing. I will absolutely be going there again.

name: Mr Ken
text: I visited Massage Shang after reading their reviews. I must say i wasn't disappointed. One of the best massage i have ever had. Lily is good and professional. I would recommend her!

name: joel lightner
text: My first ever full body massage did not disappoint! Excellent prices, super friendly staff, and left feeling like a million bucks.

name: Almosta Farm
text: This is our first couples body massage. They made us feel very comfortable, and accommodated us however we needed. Loved it!

name: Adrian Abshire
text: My visit was excellent - the masseuse was very good and friendly. She helped with all the sore spots and did not rush.  I feel great and reinvigorated.  The waiting room is nice and the rooms are clean and very comfortable.  Will recommend to my family and friends.

name: Mike Morris
text: Great massage! Very professional at what they do and an extremely clean environment.

name: Phyllis Gibbs
text: Was not impressed at all !!!! After you pay for your message they try to tell you how much to tip!!! Some of the things they said was very inappropriate!!! I will not go back there!!!!!!

name: Curt Bevington
text: Outstanding!  Service, professionalism, atmosphere and price are great but the staff, Michelle, Heidi and Mia make this my go-to place to fix the knots whether from work, traveling or just sitting on the couch too much. The quality is top notch and compared to most, they rank at the top of a long list of providers. I've walked in without appointment and called ahead and always the same great service. You will not be disappointed with Shàng or the Ladies who will leave you relaxed and revitalized. My thanks Ladies and I'll see you again soon.

name: Tanveer Zia
text: Amazing service every time, very professional staff, clean and tidy spa. Went for a couples massage twice now, once foot massage and once table massage. Heidi is amazing (wife’s favorite) and Mia is awesome too. You cannot go wrong at Massage Shàng!

name: MARGARET PENNY PTERNITIS
text: I went because I had purchased a Groupon for a 60 minute foot massage. Place is nice and clean. Michelle is AMAZING! I have diabetes and she made my feet feel so much better. Cannot say enough good things about them, will be back soon!

name: S A
text: The BEST and only massage spa I will go to in Huntsville Madison area. Nicest sweetest ladies work here, I always have a good time and feel like a new person walking out of Massage Shàng. They take care of you like real friends ❤️

name: Mike Williams
text: Amazing massage therapy by Mia. Nice, friendly and very professional. She has the gentle hands of a delicate woman but the strength of a strong man. Can cater to any level of intensity. Would definitely go back again.

name: Scott G.
text: Tried Massage Shang for the first time and have to say the massage I was received was outstanding.  Very clean and friendly establishment.  Prices are also unbelievably low over commercial massage establishments.  I will definitely be a repeat customer.

name: Aaron Hansen
text: Very good massage, will be back

name: Dewane Mills
text: Michelle is very nice !

name: Ginny Franks
text: It isn’t cheap, but the relief the IV Therapy cocktail provided is well worth the cost. Will definitely do again.

name: Hickory Homestead
text:
If you are looking for a great way to perk up your energy and get your head out of the fog then look no further, you have found the place!  The IV cocktails are great and make you feel like a million bucks. The memberships are great, the people are sweet and the recliners are very comfy.  Move over energy drinks You’ve gotta love the B12 Lipo shots for a great boost of energy.
I was just in a few days ago and the nurse on staff was very professional and courteous.  I’m using the High dose Vitamin C as an alternative cancer therapy with great results!   I recommend Hydralive Therapy highly!

name: Savannah Bunt
text: Had a wonderful experience!! The staff was beyond friendly and so helpful in helping me pick a cocktail! I was trying to kick some long lasting effects from COVID and the IV did me wonders of good! I don’t feel like a zombie just making it through the day anymore!! Will definitely be back!!

name: Casey Gillespie
text: I suffered from severe dehydration after a long, hot day outdoors.  I went in to get rehydrated with additional vitamins.  It was quick and easy.  It made me feel much better afterward. Highly recommended!

name: JoEllen Brown
text: My last visit was in November before a 26.3 mile hike. I am always comfortable and know I will be taken care of. The staff is always friendly and helpful. I will be back!

name: Marcie Foster
text: Great experience! Distanced and safe without losing the relaxing atmosphere. Felt so much better afterwards for several days, a week.

name: Kaitlyn Bentley
text: Hydralive is great! It's super convenient, comfortable, and quick! Even if you don't love needles, they make it very calming and also offer other treatments that don't involve needles. It's one of those places that you didn't know you needed until you go - I love it!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in Kaitlyn! It's our pleasure to make your experience as comfortable as possible so you can get back to feeling 100%. We appreciate your kind words! We hope you visit again soon.

name: Sara Thompson
text: I cannot say enough positive things about this business. The staff are always friendly and very knowledgeable about the products and services. The atmosphere is pleasant and quiet. As an athlete, I take race prep and recovery very seriously; hydralive has the services I need to prepare for any race. I look forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Sara. We love helping athletes reach their full potential, both before and after races!

name: Pamela Carroll
text: It was a great experience! Lori and Kaley explained everything and was very professional but fun. I would definitely recommend Hydralive!!

resp.text: Pamela, thank you for taking the time to share your experience we us. We feel fortunate to have the staff we do! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Monika Strickland
text: My girlfriend and I came in a few weeks ago for b12 shots. The paperwork was quick and simple, there was no wait time, and we were in and out in less than 20 minutes. Will definitely come again.

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in, Monika! We're so glad to hear your visit with us was great. We can't wait for you to come by again!

name: ShaToria Conway
text: The staff was great. They are friendly and helpful. I'm a very hard stick but they did better than the ER. I would definitely recommend them. I feel so much better.

resp.text: Thank you ShaToria! We love the skills our licensed RNs bring. Hope to see you again soon.

name: tadpole Tadpole
text: The staff is always so kind and considerate. They make the whole process so comfortable. I’ve never worked with someone who wasn’t friendly and willing to help in anyway possible. There’s a reason I visit them so often. Your wellness is their priority.

name: Brianandlori Priest
text: Very profesional,clean environment. I love the health benefits and choices that they offer.😁

resp.text: Thank you for taking a moment to review your experience with us. We hope you'll come see us again soon!

name: Jana Massenburg
text: Beautiful new location! You feel right at home while taking care of your hydration and vitamin needs!  I drive 1 hour to visit them, that is how awesome they are!!!

resp.text: Thank you for making the mission to continually visit us Jana! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit!

name: Lindsey Kahn
text: Would highly recommend! The staff was friendly and professional, their space was very clean but also inviting, and the service was quick! Not to mention the large recliners with cozy blankets and Apple TV!!

resp.text: Five stars! Thanks so much for your kind words, Lindsey. Let us hook you up again soon.

name: Katie Allen
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Convenient location with ample parking. I’ve tried a variety of cocktails and leave feeling great every time!

resp.text: Such kind words, Katie. Thanks! We agree - our staff is pretty awesome.

name: Catarina Phillips
text: Staff were super friendly and awesome, the hard head cocktail helped get rid of my migraine, and the nausea with it. So much better than waiting at a doctors office in pain, forever. I just walked in and immediately was able to get some relief. So thankful for you guys!

resp.text: We know how debilitating migraines can be and we're so glad we could help you feel better! Thank you for coming in Catarina.

name: Patch Atomz
text: Kind, clean, and quick. Great service, exceptional environment/atmosphere. Will return.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and taking the time to review your experience with us. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Jeannie Smith
text: Very kind courteous people! Looking forward to my weekly visits.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words, Jeannie! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Jim Trucks
text: My experience with Hydralive Therapy in Birmingham couldn't have been better. I had been wanting to try cryotherapy for a while and decided to give it a chance at Hydralive. When I arrived, the staff quickly walked me through the process and answered every question I had. Since it was my first time, they gave me examples of what some of the regulars do during cryo and that was very helpful. It's a great staff at a great location. I'll be going back.

name: Kelvin Wallace
text: Just not sure why I cheated my training and put this off for so long.  I am marathon training and this is the most awesome recovery tool I've ever experienced.

name: Lindi Pearson
text: Love this place. Staff extremely friendly, enjoyable atmosphere and helps immensely

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Lindi. We hope to see you again!

name: CJ Engels
text: Very professional and friendly staff is what keeps me coming back! Services are quick and efficient with choices for everyone, that help with a multitude of health and wellness categories. Love this place!

name: Madison Turner
text: I had a really fantastic experience, the staff was really nice and it was a comfortable atmosphere.

resp.text: We feel very fortunate to have such an awesome staff - thank you for your kind word and sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Mitchell Caldwell
text: Hannah was awesome. She got my IV started on the first try with no pain at all. I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Hi Mitchell! We're so glad to hear your visit with us was great! We appreciate you stopping in and we hope to see you again soon. Thank you for your feedback!

name: danielle yancey
text: Hydralive Therapy is a safe and healthy way to rehydrate and also with vitamins!! There are many options of "cocktails" to choose from. I also love the Cryotherapy available! It is a comfortable, clean and private place to relax for both the IV Therapy and Cryotherapy. Wonderful Staff & Experience!

resp.text: Hey Danielle! Thanks so much for your kind words. We're just tickled pink you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you stop in again to rehydrate and get your vitamins again soon! 😊

name: Kasidy Smith
text: I have dysautonomia, chronic constipation, and a vomiting disease. I was going to the emergency room and being admitted into the hospital every month for fluids. I found hydralive and I go every month to receive fluids and I haven’t been back to the ER since! So happy to have this place it’s so peaceful and calming too. Thank you hydralive therapy!

resp.text: We're so glad to hear you've found a treatment that works well for you. Thanks for the kind word, Kasidy.

name: Caitlin Miley
text: I have a B12 deficiency and was looking for a convenient place to get my weekly shots (the doctor’s office isn’t always quick) and HydralIVe has been exactly that! It’s very convenient, never takes long, and the staff are all friendly, professional and talented!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We're so glad to hear you've enjoyed your experience at our clinic. Thanks for the five stars!

name: Brandon Cornelison
text: I've tried hydralive therapy several times and have always had a great experience. From cryo to iv treatments this stuff really does work! The staff is always great and I leave feeling refreshed and revitalized every time! I would highly recommended hydralive therapy!!

name: Ralene Cosby
text: I have had 2 major surgeries in the last year and although I have recovered, I’ve been feeling dehydrated and depleted ever since. Like I’m always playing catch-up but never getting “there”. The services and workers at HydraLive have been the answer. Within 10 minutes of my first visit, I knew this was what my body had been craving and became a member. The staff and nurses are extremely knowledgeable and caring. They offer so many options and customize for exactly what you need/want. The chairs are comfortable and plenty of TVs to watch what you want with the remote in your hand. I am so thankful they are here and highly recommend!

name: Robin McDermond
text: Highly recommend! Fantastic place all around.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Robin!

name: Cheryl Martin
text: It was such a relaxing experience that I took a nap while the fluid was going. The staff is very friendly, and the place is very clean and comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you for coming by Cheryl! We're happy to hear your time with us was a relaxing break from the rush of life! Stop in again soon for another nap. 😉😊

name: Sisily Warner
text: Very professional, friendly, and took care of my migraine in less than an hour! Will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, Sisily! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Joe Powers
text: Great service. Wonderful product. I love the experience !

resp.text: Thanks for your kinds words, Joe! Come see us again soon.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Loved it.  Great staff, cozy clean environment.

resp.text: Glad to hear Ashley! Thank you for joining the #IVLeague.

name: Allison Callahan
text: It was a quick, friendly, and enjoyable service! Will go back for sure!

resp.text: Thank Allison - please come see us again soon!

name: jones020493
text: I suffer from an autoimmune illness that causes migraines, nausea, and sometimes other imbalances. Hydralive has been instrumental in helping me control these symptoms. I've gone quite often since March, sometimes preemptively and sometimes in the middle of illness. At either time, this place has saved me a ton of copays and ER visit fees. Not to mention every single time I've walked through their door, they've had some type of discount offered. I wouldn't advise disregarding regular medical care, but I definitely believe in using them as a supplement to help with my healthcare regimen. With all that said, they have some services that I haven't used yet including weight loss and cryotherapy... I'm a loyal supporter.

resp.text: Hi there! We are so thrilled to hear we've been beneficial to you feeling your best. When you're ready, we're open to talking about weight loss and cryotherapy with you. Thank you for your continuous support! We look forward to your next visit.

name: lauran roddam
text: Great customer service! Relaxing environment!

resp.text: Hi Lauran! Thank you for your kind words. We're so glad your experience with us was great. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Joshua Mize
text: I love Hydralive! It's my go-to when I need a boost or want to practice a little self-care.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Joshua. We hope you'll come see us again soon!

name: Jonathan Brown
text: Great place to rehydrate and recover. Great for muscle soreness or recovering after a long night.

resp.text: Rehydration is key! Thanks for coming in to see us, Jonathan.

name: Neil Ramey
text: Very quick . Very easy in and out

resp.text: Thanks so much Neil. Come let us hook you up again soon!

name: Borden Burns
text: The nicest staff imaginable.

name: Stephen Guthrie
text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words, Stephen. We hope to see you again!

name: Rich Pennino
text: Great place!! Come and check them out!!

resp.text: Thank you for coming by Rich! We hope to see you again soon.

name: abby judson

resp.text: Thanks for the kinds words, Abby. We hope you'll come see us again soon.

name: Ashley Davie
text: Feeling great after Beast Mode & cryotherapy session

resp.text: Awesome to hear Ashley! Those are both services that leave customers very happy with their decision. Hope to see you again soon.

name: winterdr
text: much better this go around!

resp.text: Thank you for coming in! Glad you enjoyed your experience.

name: RENEE JOHNSON
text: I look forward to my weekly B12 shot and the boost it gives me!

name: Priscilla King
text: Awesome Service

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Priscilla! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Felicia Mills
text: Lyndi is the best!!! One of the sweetest and thoughtful people I know. She is always timely and accommodating, and the best part of it all is she is helping me loose this fat and sculpt my body. She tells me exactly which services to use to maximize my results and now I am bikini ready just in time for summer!!! Thanks Lyndi!!!!

name: JASMINE ARMSTRONG
text: I am so amazed with my results after one session. Sharonda was also so amazing, she was very friendly and the building had a welcoming vibe to it. She is very knowledgeable about everything and will answer every question you have. She was very patient with me as I asked a lot of questions. She continuously asked if I was okay and if I felt any discomfort. I 100% recommend booking an appointment if you want any type of body sculpting done, you will not be disappointed! I am already excited for my next appointment!

name: Cara Jenise
text: Amazing place to get all your massage and sculpting needs. Post op ladies...yes they offer the lymphatic drainage massage.. I just loveeee my Lyndi.

name: Keisha Graves
text: I absolutely love Sharonda! She is so professional and kind. I've had 3 different services in the last month. I have not been disappointed at all. I will continue to support her business. The atmosphere is so calming and welcoming, that you will continue to want to go back.

name: JAMEKA MOORE
text: My experience at the Body Sculpting Studio was amazing. I didn’t know what to expect. Sharonda walked me through the entire process. During the initial consultation she told me exactly how many sessions I would need.  I love my results. If you are in the area and you have questions give her a call. Sharonda will take care of you.

name: Zoe Giles
text: 10/10 RECOMMEND!  Very nice, professional, and friendly! Also very knowledgeable!

name: Lawanda Mcervin
text: Today was my first session and I am absolutely AMAZED with my results after just ONE session! Sharonda worked with me! She is very knowledgeable, professional, and as sweet as can be! The atmosphere was very relaxing and welcoming. I encourage men and women to give her a call and let her work her magic! I can’t wait to see my result after my third session🌻

name: LaQuisha Tarver
text: I love the atmosphere. It instantly relaxed me as soon as I walked through the doors and the staff is so nice, warm spirited and professional . I will definitely be back! 💕

name: Lashanda Foster
text: My experience was AMAZING! Sharonda is professional and knowledgeable. The facility was everything I hoped for and I look forward to building a lasting relationship.

name: Lashana Valentine
text: Sharonda and Lindy are beyond Amazing! I’m a RN of 17yrs & was ready to start my own spa business, but I wanted to be professionally trained to ensure that I am able to provide quality services. After seeing my best friend get taken advantage of by other so called “trainers” I wanted to find the best of the best to learn from. Sharonda at Body Sculpting Studio is the G.O.A.T. PERIOD!!!!! The Body Sculpting Studio is THE BEST place for thorough hands on  training!!! I got way more than expected!!! They showed us the best machines to use & included one in our package to keep, gave us honest feedback, vendors lists for the equipment they use, and information to get our businesses up and running, and still offered us continued access to them, to help us with any questions! On top of that they provided an amazing lunch and refreshments! This is the best spa EVER!!!!

name: Victoria Jackson
text: Sharonda is absolutely amazing!! I appreciate how real and knowledgeable she is. This is really your one stop shop from waxing to steams to body sculpting they will truly take care of you !

name: Gwendolyn Reynolds
text:
I definitely enjoyed my experience at the Body Sculpting Studio and Spa! Sharonda and her staff are very professional and knowledgeable.
The atmosphere was so relaxing and inviting. I'm definitely looking forward to my next visit. Thank you again Sharonda for adjusting your schedule for me!

name: Patrice Steward
text: OMG where do I start lol The Professionalism is threw the roof! I had such an amazing experience with getting the Strawberry Lipo & Lipo Cavitation and may I add a Lunch Break Butt Lift. Lyndi is such a sweetheart, she molded my body back into shape and I feel like myself again. One of the best things I ever spent my money on thanks to "The Body Sculpting Studio" for giving me back my confidence. Lyndi and Sharonda I'm forever grateful for you guys.

name: Monique Struggs
text: I've had two sessions so far and I'm loving my results. I recommend using Sharonda, she is very professional, down to earth and most importantly she knows what she is doing. She is very knowledgeable and has answered all my questions and put me at ease

name: K. S
text: This was my second visit and the service today was every bit as excellent as the previous visit. Sheronda was very warm and welcoming as well as Brittany who did my facial and wax/eyebrow tint. The services being performed are explained with aftercare instructions. I will definitely be returning again in the near future.

name: Sherria De'Von
text: OMG!!!! Where do I start?! I took a body contouring class with Sharonda and it was absolutely amazing! She and Lyndi are very knowledgeable and their personalities are beautiful. They truly teach from the heart and are so professional. I have since started getting my facials here and let me tell you. AMAZING!  If you’re looking to take your business to another level or if you’re looking for a nice relaxing atmosphere to go and get beautified. This is your place! I love it here and will continue to travel from Atlanta to receive services here!

name: Sentrice Johnson
text: I had a dermaplaning facial done and my eyebrows and Brittany was sooo nice and professional and I was extremely satisfied with my results especially my eyebrows. Definitely will be going back.

name: Charrie Myles
text: Sharonda and Lyndi are so warm and welcoming. From the time I booked my appointment, Sharonda was very communicative and answered any questions I had, in addition to educating me on the best services for what I wanted to do. I felt comfortable and being new to the area if was nice to come into a place and have that feeling. Professional, clean, easy to find, practicing safety measures as well. I already have my next two appointments booked.

name: K.P. Evans
text: Very nice and informative 👍

name: Lady2U
text: I don’t know much about this place

name: Kiara Moten
text: BLACK EXCELLENCE !! absolutely love their shop GREAT customer service, VERY professional, VERY CLEAN & NEAT! special shoutout to LYNDI she makes each appointment comfortable and knowledgeable & results are jaw dropping ! Sharonda is the BEST as well ! I highly recommend 💕

name: Kurstyn Jolly
text: Drove all the way from Atlanta and Sharonda was absolutely amazing! She truly cares about her client and making sure they are educated in the service they are receiving. The facility was pristine clean and so very welcoming. I would recommend any and everyone to go see her AND I'll be back!

name: Evita Tarver
text: Looking for professional and clean environment this is the place. The vibes are straight relaxing creating a wonder experience in all areas of service blessings to BSS

name: N T
text:
Sharonda has amazing customer service and really cares about our wants and needs.  Her business is beautiful and elegantly decorated and smells great.  Very relaxing atmosphere.  I have been to her a few times and have even sent my mother to her.  She does an awesome job and we see results instantly and continue to see them with each passing day.  We follow her directions and she checks in to see how we are doing.  We love going to her and will continue to!  We wish her continued success!!!

##StaySnatchedWithSharonda

name: Jasmine Thomas
text: I’ve known Sharonda for a a few years and when I seen that she had opened the spa I had to support. Her work is incredible she has given me confidence that I had lost and I truly appreciate that. The staff is very professional the spa is very clean and very organized I love it!

name: Christina Douglas
text: Very professional , knowledgeable , relaxing environment, providing awesome services conveniently located. I really enjoyed my experience and look forward to  coming back. Sharonda is the best😍 I will be inviting my friends.

name: Brandy Harris
text: I’m HUGE on customer service, results, and over all experience!!! It’s obvious Sharonda prides herself and business on these merits as well. Let’s start with the establishment. It’s beautiful, clean, and peaceful. Great for a relaxing and a therapeutic day. Now the services. My problem areas included my chin, stomach, love handles, and butt (or lack thereof). Her services focused on those areas and the results were amazing after just one session! It’s so nice to have this new establishment in Montgomery Alabama! I can’t express the level of confidence and satisfaction I left the Body Sculpting Studio and Spa with. My advice, call Sharonda you won’t be disappointed! Her services range from vaginal rejuvenation to non surgical liposuction and butt lifts. She suggests multiple sessions and will answer any and all questions to ensure you are 100% knowledgeable and comfortable. Literally the epitome of professional and passionate about her craft. I strongly recommend!!!

name: Messina Thompson
text: I love love love this place !!! The staff are absolutely amazing and knowledgeable! Professional and very clean !!! Will be returning !

name: Valarie Satterwhite-hill
text: Excellent service

name: Brittani Grant
text: I love this spa!!! I have had 2 procedures with ShaRhonda and have experienced nothing less than stellar results!!!

name: Nicole McNeal
text: I am so pleased with my experience at the Body Sculpting Studio and Spa!  Let me start by saying Sharonda is AMAZING! She made me feel so comfortable and at ease. She was very knowledgeable and was genuinely happy to answer any questions I had. I received the iLipo and cavitation procedures, because after three c-sections my tummy needed some tlc. There was no pain and no recovery time needed, which was a very big appeal for me getting this done. Let me say, Sharonda's wrist game is on point!!!!! She really cares about her craft and I got great results! I'm now wearing a size 7/8 (down from a 14/16 before I got the procedure), and I love trying on clothes again. Most importantly, I love seeing my body in the mirror, and my tummy and I are good friends now. I'll definitely be going going back for a steaming treatment next time. I recommend going to the Body Sculpting Studio and Spa for a truly rejuvenating experience, body and soul.

name: Natasha Walker
text: EXCELLENT customer service, support, and atmosphere!!

name: Positively Angelic Vegan
text: This place was awesome!! My husband and I did a float on my birthday. They were offering 25% off for teachers that day, which was yesterday. Each pod is in a private room with a shower. It is very relaxing. The manager is so nice and informative. I highly recommend!!!

name: Jade Chappell
text: I really enjoyed my first experience! It was a little awkward at first and the complete darkness made me nervous, but I soon got settled in and was able to relax peacefilly. If you have small ears, bring your own earplugs and if you can only use specific hair care products, make sure you bring them. I am pregnant and was cleared by my doctor to give this a go and e enjoyed it tremendously. I will be back!

name: kitty bee
text: 1.Bring your own earplugs that fit comfy, people/ladies who have a unique face shape will have the ones provided fall out. 2. They have showers and a powder room. Bring all things needed to get ready after you are done, Bring a swim cap or wrap if you dont plan on washing your hair, the condensation of the salt tank will cause your hair to look like you have a bad case of dandruff and or can place travel like that dude on that movie jumpers and you mystical return back from a snowy place. 3. Your neck my get sore, a snorkel set would have been amazing to have. I loved it, I recommend it, but to make it better would be good and Eye goggles so the condensation from the tank doesn't get into your eyes, if not put a towel right next to the tub.

name: Andrew Fandre
text: A floatation spa in Huntsville! This is an exciting opportunity to experience a truly relaxing and intimate experience. The one person pods are very warm and inviting. The water is filled with epsom salts which is good for removing lactic acid from sore muscles. While floating, it's impossible not to feel relaxed. You are a cork on the water, it's impossible to sink. They have a foam collar for your head and a spray bottle of water to clear your eyes or mouth should you get any of the salty water in your mouth or eyes. A personal shower allows you to clean the water off after the float. You definitely feel different after a float. It's a unique experience.

name: Terrell Nixon
text: Great experience.  Wife loved it also. Will start putting on our reg schedule

name: Danny Todd
text:
Very glad to have these guys in town!
Great rates, quality facilities, excellent staff.
Knowledgeable and very friendly.

name: J B
text: I booked an appointment and received the confirmation email only to arrive to a closed building.  Their website and Facebook page said they were open. I called but no answer so then I messaged them on Facebook and received a reply that just said we don’t show any appointments today. I sent them a screen shot of my confirmation email for my apt and she was still rude and said they were closed today and did not offer to make this right.  I assume they must be going out of business since no none was even there on a Saturday.   If this is how they treat customers I would imagine this is why they weren’t able to be open.  Don’t bother with this company.

name: douglas besherse
text: I went to Tranquility for my first float and am very happy I did. Not only did the float itself exceed my expectations on what I experienced but the facility is kept up extremely well, and the staff here are very welcoming and professional. I really appreciated the fact they had a recovery room established for after the float as I used that room for about 30 minutes and it came in handy for journaling and relaxing afterwards. I look forward to continuing to float here. This place is the real deal!

name: Chris Poore
text: Very relaxing. A different way to experience sensory deprivation in a really cool way. You float in pods filled water and Epsom salt.

name: Kenneth Jarrell
text: The most relaxing and pain relieving place in town! Hands down the best 60 minutes of your day, guaranteed.

name: Josef Enfinger
text: Absolutely love this place. If you're looking at this review for assurance go now, stop wondering! It's absolutely worth it!

name: Nina Westmoreland
text: You will not be disappointed this place is amazing I have been once an am so hooked can't wait to come back again for mothers day it's 100 times better than a massage

name: Brian Wood
text:
Float therapy is magical. I used to drive to Nashville regularly. I'm thrilled that we have a local place for this now. It's great for pain, stress, and all kinds of stuff.
Very clean, very professional place.

name: Mark Burnett
text: Simply amazing and extremely relaxing. I fully recommend Tranquility Float Spa!

name: Battle Kitten
text: I am pain free for the first time in a long ling time.  I am sore from a wreck and I have back pain. So I am trying this along with massage and chiropractor.

name: Scendera Darkcleod
text: Amazing session! Very relaxing.

name: Chris Hardy
text: Neat place, great staff. Don't let your ear plugs fall out or you will regret it for days.

name: Nghia Huynh
text: As of 2/9/2019, this facility has been closed. The website should not allow you to create appointments.

name: Martin Elrod
text: Always a Great Experience!!

name: Tanner Schaack
text: Relaxing experience that can benefit anyone

name: Jed Park
text: Try it, you'll like it.

name: Barbara Moskow
text: Loved it

name: Diego Covarrubias
text: Highly recommend it! It is amazing!!

name: Jill Esterly
text: I have gotten many massages over the years but this was absolutely the best massage I've ever gotten. Hailey listened to all my concerns and applied the amount of pressure I asked for. She focused on the areas I had mentioned were giving me issues. The ambiance was extremely calming, soothing, and relaxing. It was a great experience all around. I will definitely be coming back here.

resp.text: We're so happy to hear you had a great experience! We hope to see you back again soon :)

name: Brad G
text: Michelle is a caring massage therapist. She's been helping me with my usual aches/pains resulting from a desk job for years.

name: Leigh Cella
text:
I have had many massages over the years. My massage was unlike any massage I have ever received. IT WAS AMAZING! And that does not even come close to how I would describe my massage.

If you want to feel better contact Abiding Hands Therapy now. Even a day after I still feel the tranquility.

Thank you Abiding Hands, thank you
-Leigh

resp.text: Thank you so much for you review! It was such a pleasure to have you in, we are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us!

name: Ladonna Allen
text: WOW, what an amazing session I had with Hailee! I have had many, many massages but never one that addressed and relieved so many of my issues. Not only did I leave completely relaxed, but I no longer had a headache and could move my neck and hips without cringing. If you are in need of a therapist that knows how to listen to you and provide the best deep tissue massage ever, then Hailee is your person. I live an hour away but it is certainly worth the trip and can’t wait to return.

name: April Jossey
text: I had the most wonderful massage with Hailee today. I went in with back pain & came out feeling so much better. She was a great listener when I told about my problem areas and she was able to easily find them and successfully work them out. I was so pleased with the experience that I’ve already scheduled my next appointment!

name: Kami Pearson
text: Hailee did a wonderful job! Very convenient location and very relaxing room! Best massage I’ve EVER had! I will definitely be back and I highly recommend it!

name: Tristan Graham
text: I had been driving to Birmingham to receive Myofascial Release Therapy once a week until I was referred to Hailee, and let me tell you that she is INCREDIBLE! I can walk in and just tell her to “fix me” and I leave feeling so much better. She is very knowledgeable, kind and calming. I highly recommend her.

name: Vanita Turner
text: Michelle, thank you for an amazing and perfect massage. It was my first Ashiatsu but will not be the last, you have definitely mastered this technique. The ambience in your therapy room is beautiful and relaxing. I will definitely look forward to my next sessions on future visits to Huntsville.

name: Beth Heflin
text: Michelle is amazing! Best massage I've ever had in my life. She listens and follows through. I don't feel like I've been beaten up. I feel fresh and new and energized! I recommend you make an appointment right away!

name: Jennifer Morgan
text: Michelle gives the best massages! I never had a massage I enjoyed before going to her and now I am a regular customer. She will work just the spots I ask her to so I can get the exact relief and relaxation I need!

name: Fern Brazda
text: I had one of the best massages. I have back problems and my back felt great, I was relaxed in this most comfortable relaxing atmosphere. Feeling relaxed without pain was my main objective and I came home pain free and relaxed! I can’t wait to get another ashiatsu  massage!

name: Travis Nixon
text:
I've been seeing Michelle at Abiding Hands for a while now.  When I was playing soccer and dancing regularly my muscles would get really tight and sore.  Michelle worked with me and after a couple of sessions the pain stopped.

I've had massages at other places that hurt and I just figured "pain = tight muscles leaving the body."  But with Michelle, I was surprised at how much release I got with almost no discomfort at all.  I would definitely recommend you give them a visit.

name: james elliott
text: Michelle is absolutely amazing.  I went for a 75 minute ashiatsu and I wish it wouldn’t have ended.  I felt the best I have ever felt and it was an experience I wish everyone would experience.  I highly recommend it.  If you are on the fence then make the appointment and you will not regret it.

name: Rebecca Stephens
text: Michelle is an amazing massage therapist! She's very professional and knowledgeable and cares about her clients. Highly recommend!

name: Misty Ortiz
text: I have tried several types of massage from many different places over the years and this was one of the best! I saw Michelle for an Ashiatsu massage. The pressure was deep and it was very relaxing and therapeutic!!

name: Jalesia Semien
text: This was an amazing experience and Michelle has wonderful spirit!

name: Lauren Honeycutt
text: Michelle did an amazing job. I was so relaxed during and after the massage. I will be going to her from now on-highly recommend.

name: Mollie Garland
text: Michelle is a wonderful massage therapist!  She has always provided an overall relaxing experience. I highly recommend her!

name: Stacy Pierce
text: Michelle worked with me while I was pregnant. She gives great prenatal massages and is obviously committed to helping all her clients. I would highly recommend her!

name: Rachel Rushing
text: Hailee’s intuitive ability to locate and work areas to release tension is amazing! Hailee combines her knowledge of the body with a flow that relaxes you while healing.

name: Amy Goddard
text: Michelle is a true professional. She knows her field, she cares about her clients, and she provides a warm, enjoyable atmosphere for relaxation. Refreshing is the word best used to describe Michelle and a session with her.

name: Tanya McCune
text: I received a phenomenal massage with Michelle.   Very professional and a superbly relaxing experience

name: Sandy Tebben
text: Hailee is awesome! Very professional, friendly and caring

name: Stacey Hinson
text: Michelle is an amazing Reiki practioner. In all my sessions she has taken great care to guide me through my healing process. She is intuitive and takes time to help me understand everything that comes through. If you are seeking am awesome Reiki practioner look no further...book now you won't regret it!

name: Shelly Carr
text: I was very skeptical about going because of a bad experience a couple of years ago but in desperate need, so glad I went . Hailee was very professional and tended to my needs. I will be a repeat customer!!

name: Ashley Freeman
text: Everyone needs to go see Michele at Abiding Hands Therapy! She is a miracle worker! Wouldn’t go to any other massage therapist!

name: sheshe berdos
text: AMAZING.... total relaxation from the everyday stress.  Must try it for health of body, mind, and spirit!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kristy Gregory
text: Absolutely loved how professional and clean this float spa was. This was my first visit, but I have floated before and knew what to expect. It was very welcoming and explained well, I never felt rushed and could completely relax during my visit. I used a pool room and enjoyed the extra large space. I’ll definitely be booking future visits when I’m back in Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kristy!

name: Kensie Faldoski
text: This place is great! Very clean, accommodating, and relaxing. The woman who checked me in was very friendly as well.

resp.text: Thank you Kensie!

name: Balance Universal
text: This is such a magnificent experience! If you are debating on going, just go. One hour of calmness and relaxation. An opportunity to escape the craziness of the world. One hour will feel like an eternity of ease. Allow yourself thr experience. The service there is amazing. They will prepare you for rejuvenation that your mind, body, and soul need.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was great having y’all!

name: Maura McGraw
text: Beautiful place with wonderful owners! Floating is one thing that really helps me when I am experiencing a lot of stress and anxiety. My float at Magnolia Float Spa helped me a lot and the owners went out of their way to check in with me and pray with me. It was truly a wonderful experience and I will definitely be coming back.

resp.text: Thank you so much Maura!

name: Dana Hunter Fradella
text: Bring yourself and everyone you love here asap. I'm a wellness junkie and Magnolia Float Spa takes the cake for self-care and stress-relief. I wish I lived in the area, we'd be here every single week. The owners are incredible and have considered every detail in making your float experience relaxing, healing, and a perfect way to take care of you. We'll be back every time we visit the area, thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much Dana! It is always great having you!

name: Carrie Perry
text: I thoroughly enjoyed my float experience, as did our 10 and 12 year old boys. I chose a personal pool and the hour’s float went by faster than I’d expected. The saltwater is not kind to your face or eyes so there is no going under but it is very relaxing and peaceful. A good place to get away, center, and pamper yourself.

resp.text: Thank you so much Carrie!

name: Fredrica Lewis
text: This is an amazing float spa, if you haven't been go check it out. Carry & Taylor are great!

resp.text: Thank you Fredrick! Glad you enjoyed the float!

name: Theresa J. Gaser
text: Where do I start??? I have floated at several spas. I love the experience and always feel so much better. Improved sleep, peace of mind, less pain. I decided to bring a friend for her BDay and could not have picked a better Spa! We were met by Carry and Tayler who we found out later were the owners. They are amazing! They clearly care about their customers and the place was immaculate!!! I could go on and on about how wonderful our entire experience was but you should go and see for yourself!

resp.text: Thank you so much Theresa! It was great having y’all with us!

name: Dusty Michaud
text: Great staff. Very clean and professional. Will definitely visit again.

resp.text: Thank you Dusty!

name: Karli Merchant
text: I just had my first experience floating about 20 minutes ago and it was amazing. I have never felt more relaxed in my life. The people there were so very nice and the man who showed us around (I didn’t catch his name) had the most soothing voice lol. But I absolutely loved it. Definitely will be coming back!

resp.text: So glad y’all tried floating and had a relaxing experience! Thank you!

name: Bobbie Ford
text: Where to start? Magnolia Float Spa makes your experience pleasant and comforting from start to finish. Whether you are there for pain relief ,a spiritual journey, or just to relax and unwind you are in good hands. Easy to schedule, beautiful facility, and smiling faces. I can't recommend these guys enough. If I told you there was a secret portal to the center of the universe that allowed you to look deep within to solve all your problems AND also reach a state of bliss that is indescribable, would you not step through that door ? Well, guess what? That portal is real, and Magnolia has 4 of them. Schedule your appointment today because what is more important than your mental health?

resp.text: Thank you Bobbie! We are so glad you received so much from floating!

name: Andres Santa
text: What an amazing relaxing experience! Taylor and Carry are supper knowledgeable individuals. They explained in detail what to expect while in the float tank. Being In Gulf Shores the location is convenient for travelers. Their Spa is well decorated,  very clean,and spacious. Words cannot explain the magnitude of relief you feel after your float! Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone to tryout.

resp.text: Thank you Andres!

name: Christan Veach
text: This was such a cool experience. The owners are extremely nice, we almost had to cancel our appointment cause my boyfriend is in the military and was running late from getting off work and they were really understanding and patient and so nice! After being a few minutes behind they walked us through everything and didn’t make us feel rushed and let us begin our first float. Afterwards we had hot tea and talked to them about or experience! Everyone should try the float spa at some point!

resp.text: Thank you so much Christan! It was great having y’all!

name: Stephen Alan Cox
text: I'm a regular floater, and Magnolia was a great float spa to visit while on vacation. Carrie, in particular, was absolutely a gem. I will definitely be back the next time I'm in town visiting.

resp.text: Thanks Stephen for this awesome review! Hope to see you soon! Safe travels.

name: Craig Brooks
text: When I showed up for my experience, I was greeted with a smile. After confirming my reservation, they ran my card for the reservation and any incidentals (they explained that there are things that you could ruin or break). This was my first time, but I signed the waiver online that they sent to me via email before arriving. They explained the experience to me at a little lobby area with table and chairs, and they gave me some sandals to wear instead of shoes. Then they escorted me to my room, probably about 8x12 (Edit: 8x16 feet per owner response below) feet in size. They show you the preparations you should take on the wall in the room and a few things about operating the pod. They provide everything you need right down to a contacts case and solution. It's a sensory deprivation chamber, but you can choose to have music on in the pod if you prefer. I was in for about an hour. Good experience. They give you everything you need, but it's up to you to relax while floating in the filtered and heavily salted (Epsom salt) water. Afterward, you can go back to the lobby area and are offered a healthy variety of hot tea to continue relaxing. The person in charge joined me for a nice chat, and I left. I do feel relaxed and the experience was as perfect as it can get from beginning to end. Recommended for those that need a break from all the noise and everything.

resp.text: Thank you Craig for the review! We are glad you enjoyed the process and you were very close on the room size! The pod rooms are 8’x16’ in case you were curious.

name: Royfactor
text: Best RELAXING DAY YOU AND YOUR SPOUSE COULD EVER HAVE! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND! THE OWNERS ARE AMAZING AS WELL!

resp.text: Thank you so much Roy! We are glad y’all had a great time!

name: Barbie Cecil
text: Took a friend to Magnolia Float Spa today. I couldn’t possibly put into words what this experience is like. Amazing doesn’t really sum it up. It is peaceful, relaxing, invigorating, enlightening all rolled up into one amazing hour. The best part of this is that the feeling of lightness and peace lasts the entire night (& into the next day)! This was my second float at Magnolia and I will be a customer for life. If you haven’t tried it, I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Barbie!

name: Shelly Armstrong
text: The float spa is amazing. I'm so relaxed and they really take care of you there. Carry was wonderful and walked me through the whole process. It's so modern and very professional there. I'll definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you Shelly! Can’t wait to see you again!

name: Hunter Collins
text: Amazing Experience! Very Clean, and welcoming! If you want a relaxing experience that goes well beyond the moment check them out!! The owners are amazing people and explained all the details and made us feel very comfortable and welcome in something that we had never done before!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hunter! We are enjoying the book y’all gave us 😁

name: Robert Epperly
text: Great experience today at Magnolia Floatation Spa in the sensory deprivation chamber. I had an hour long conversation with God during my time. The owners are great people and if you want to experience something truly life changing go see #MagnoliaSpa.

resp.text: Thank you Robert for sharing your awesome experience!

name: Grant Fielder
text: Awesome, helpful, and friendly staff. Very clean, and comfortable environment. The tank experience is one you MUST try! I loved everything about Magnolia Float Spa😄

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Grant!

name: Ashley Morgan
text: The place was very clean and the owners weren’t there but some of their family was. They were super nice. I just felt silly floating around the tub.

resp.text: Hey Ashley! Thank you for the review. The first float is usually the hardest which is why we encourage people to try it 3 times. The amount of epsom salt in the water is incredibly beneficial for inflammation reduction, but we totally understand how you feel. We wish we could have been there to explain the process and benefits thoroughly. Have a great weekend!

name: Annie N.
text:
Amazing! We had prompt, kind, and attentive care before our float. The pods, pools, and showers are all clean and well kept. Great place to float.

Sweet sweet people and great service!

resp.text: Thank you Annie! We are so happy y’all enjoyed floating!

name: Older Thandirt
text:
Excellent!!! It was such a wonderful experience that we actually hoped it rained on our vacation because we had already been there twice & couldn't wait to float again!!!
We can not wait to get back to Gulf Shores to experience Magnolia Float Spa during our vacations!!
We have not found any Float Spa nearly as nice or with as many float tanks as Magnolia Float Spa (& that's in 4 states!!).
And the owners spectacular!!!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you for the review, we are so glad y’all enjoy floating as much as we do!

name: Tinalee Warren
text: Carry and Taylor are amazing.  Always completely relaxed when we leave.  Simply love coming here.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad you love it😄

name: GAIL MERRILL
text: Amazing! Feel so relaxed and refreshed. Private, comfortable, well supplied with everything you need.

resp.text: Thank you so much Gail!

name: D L
text: Had a gift certificate from Christmas from my daughter to try Magnolia Float Spa on 1/24/2019. My first time and owners Carrie and Taylor made sure I was welcome. Open since August 2018, it’s new and super clean. I was offered a snack before and walked to my “pod” where everything was explained on how to proceed. It was an amazing, relaxing, calm, and meditative experience. Afterwards, Carrie sat with me and I was again offered a soothing cup of tea(coffee was available as well). She seemed genuinely interested in hearing about my first time floating. There is no other “spa” experience that compares to this. I highly recommend trying a float tank experience at the Magnolia Float Spa. I will be back. Thank you, Carrie and Taylor!

resp.text: Thank you so much Denise!

name: LaEpic Bazinga
text: Really relaxing. Great staff. Everything you need they thought of.

resp.text: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed floating!

name: Renee Dyken
text: The float spa is an amazing way to relax and meditate.  I have found no better way to relieve neck and shoulder stiffness. I also love the decor and the immaculate rooms.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad it helps you relax!

name: Susan Dove
text: Very clean place. Very relaxing. You should come in and give it a try.

resp.text: Thank you Susan!

name: Michael King
text: Awesome experience, hope to visit again soon. A must do if you're in the area.

resp.text: Thank you Michael, it was great having all of you!

name: amanda newton
text: 2nd visit was as great as the first! They treat you like royalty (and the float is really great too!!)

resp.text: Thank you so much Amanda! Y’all are awesome 😄

name: Ron Taravella
text: wife had her first float today...very relaxing and her hip and knee already feel better...staff was attentive to every need and detail...this is a great spa and will return!

resp.text: Thank you Ron! We are very happy Doreen was able to relax and feel better! Hope to see y’all again soon!

name: Patricia Zakar
text: Very clean and relaxing. Will definitely recommend to friends.

resp.text: Thank you Patricia!

name: Kevin Lackey
text: Clean and relaxing spa, welcoming owners, and a great float!

resp.text: Thank you Kevin for choosing to float with us on your Birthday! Hope you had a great day!

name: chris wortz
text: Great first float experience,  great location!!

resp.text: Thank you Chris! Glad you enjoyed it!

name: Lisa Delp
text: Very relaxing experience

resp.text: Thank you Lisa!

name: robert trammell
text: Beautiful place . Great service .

resp.text: Thank you Robert!

name: Sherry Marter
text: Hailey is very friendly, and informative! I'm excited about taking steps to better our families health. I am looking forward to benefitting from all of the wonderful experiences available there.

name: Vicki Webster
text: I have only been in Fairhope for several weeks and I was looking for someplace to help boost my health a bit. I sure found that home in Peak Alkalinity. I have had three foot detoxes, enjoyed the oxygen bar, infared sauna and drank lots of alkaline water! I even filled up bottles of their great alkaline water to drink at home! I feel amazing! I have been doing lots of reading about alkaline water, it is so good for you! Everyone there is so knowledgeable. After talking with Missy, Ingrid and Hailey I found that they have a strong health interest and conviction. I'm very impressed and have learned a lot from each one of them. As long as I am in town, I will continue my quest for improving my health so I will keep going there to use their services and learn all that I can! Hopefully their Salt Therapy room will be finished before I leave! Thank you Peak Alkalinity! You were just what I needed!

name: Lorene “Lo” Kinslow
text: I had a wonderful time there with my sister we sat joyed our feet getting taken care of and had a joyful time just sipping on water and watching the sunshine outside outside

name: Zoey Senn
text: I was recently at the fairhope store for a bachelorette party. I had received the oxygen bar treatment and the foot detox. The treatment was amazing. Thank you

name: DIANA FURLOW
text:
I had a foot detox, my first, and it was amazing! Missy is the bomb.com!
It’s crazy to see all the stuff that comes out through the detox.

name: Rolanda Dorsey-Sanders
text: Missy was very patient and informative. She made the entire experience relaxing as well as educational. Will definitely be a regular customer!

resp.text: So happy to have y’all join the Peak Alkalinity family!!! I enjoyed getting to know you!

name: Holley Wade
text: I will be back and try more services. I enjoyed the foot detox it was a relaxing and educational experience.

name: Vincent Sanders
text: The owner was very knowledgeable and personable. Truly enjoyed the experience. Certainly plan on going again.

resp.text: Vincent, it was a pleasure to have you and Shea in for a foot detox! Hope you had a great day for your birthday!

name: Bruna Matheson
text: We went for a Infra Red sauna and left with so much knowledge! Will be going back for sure!

resp.text: Thanks Bruna! Enjoyed meeting you both! Would love to have y’all back in!

name: Brittany francis
text: Going Peak Alkalinity was a amazing, very knowledgeable experience! The owner, Missy and her staff are so welcoming and they know there STUFF! I had never been to any place like that this, but a friend of mine gave me a gift card as a Christmas gift and I’m so glad she chose this to give to me! From the time I walked in I felt I knew Ingrid already she was so friendly and pleasant. While  working and setting me up for my services she talked about the meaning of the equipment they have in the spa and what it does  to help we as people be in tune with our body naturally... I was stayed hydrated with the purified water they have available for you. It tasted great. These ladies didn’t miss a beat on the great customer services I received and I can’t wait to get back in the spa!! I recommend this as a birthday gift, Christmas gift  and just simple thinking of you gift for anyone!

resp.text: Brittany, so pleased that we exceeded your expectations! We look forward to having you in again soon!

name: Dana Maloney
text: I love this water!  Helps me sleep better and feel better.  Want to buy the filter system for home as soon as possible.  Really appreciate Missy's customer service and genuine concern for all.  I highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much, Dana! We enjoy seeing folks achieve better quality of life! We’d love to get you (and all of your guests at the fabulous Jubilee Suites) set up so it’s convenient for everyone!

name: Anthony Jones
text: Peak Alkalinity is an evolutional way to become healthier, more alert, and on track for a better lifestyle.  My wife and I have used all of their products and treatments on the road to detoxing our bodies.  Missy, Ingrid and Bobby ensure that you know the basis of treatments and the benefits you are receiving from each visit and the use of their products.  I see and hear nothing but positive outcomes from all those who are joining us at Peak Alkalinity!

resp.text: Anthony, we love hearing this! Thank you so much for the wonderful review!

name: Kelly Killingbeck
text: Peak Alkalinity is fabulous! Everyone at this business is so friendly and efficient but more importantly,  they are very knowledgeable about health and wellness, You could not ask for a more dedicated team! I feel so good since I started  drinking the water, and using the other products they offer!  I cant wait to have my very own water system installed at my home!  Kelly

resp.text: Kelly, thanks so much for the great review. Easy to help when we’re working with a like-minded gal. 😁

name: Kari Lyke
text: Missy and Bob are awesome! We are so happy with our alkaline water machine and would highly recommend them and their products. You wont be disappointed!

resp.text:
Thanks Kari! Hope you and Howie are doing great! Let me know if there are any more cougars on the loose in the neighborhood 😂
Call if y’all need anything!

name: Whit Stuckey
text:
Missy and her team at Peak Alkalinity do a great job of educating and helping you explore the amazing health benefits of alkaline water and the many applications of acidic water. The customer testimonials, research put into the machines and health benefits of alkaline water culminate into a powerful tool each of us need to use everyday to combat an ever growing array of threats to our body. After much consideration I purchased a water ionizer for my family. I will follow up in coming months with results.

Thanks Peak Alkalinity!

resp.text: Whit, thank you for the exceptional review! We can’t wait for the follow up to hear about your progress!

name: Ginger Poling
text: Not only is the owner invested in what she does, the employees are as well. As soon as you walk in, you feel immediately welcomed. Everyone there is very knowledgeable about the benefits of alkaline water and talk you through them all. They are very educating! I had the foot detox while I was there and that was the most interesting thing I have ever done! They can tell you exactly what toxins are being pulled from your body. I was sitting next to a friend and her results were completely different form mine. I had been eating a lot of sweets and breads and they told me yeast was coming out of my body. My friend had eaten a lot of fish that week and she was having mercury released out of her body. I was in awe of my results from the foot detox! Bottom line is Peak Alkalinity is a MUST to go and get educated on all the benefits of alkaline water and detoxing.

resp.text: Thank you Ginger for such a wonderful review!

name: Nancy Franklin
text: I had the ionic foot detox. Couldn’t believe what was pulled out. Also had  an oxygen session. Definitely want to come back for another session of each in the near future!!  Thank you Missy!

resp.text: We enjoyed having you in Nancy!

name: Tracey Goens
text: I love going into peak Alkalinity.  They are so helpful and take time to explain things. Missy really cares about her clients. Love my water ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Tracey! We still laugh about the prank that y’all pulled on Bob during the install. Classic! 😂

name: Aaron VanHauter
text: Strong knowledge of the business. I walked away after 20 min understanding so much and still feel like I only scratched the surface of the knowledge of Peak Alkalinity. Strongly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Aaron! We love helping others discover optimal health from the inside out!

name: Stefanie Samson
text: I an from California and came with a friend I was visiting. It was amazing.  I can't wait to order my water system. I felt so rejuvenated and had so much energy immediately following... my poor husband on our 3 hour drive lol! I hope I can find a place to do foot detoxs near me.

resp.text: Stefanie, we love hearing this! Thank you so much for visiting us! If you are ever this way you will have to come back to see us!!!

name: Chad Bartz
text: Missy was extremely knowledgeable. A great listener to truly find out why I am interested in using a product like hers.

resp.text: The pleasure was ours, Chad! Happy to help!

name: Laura Hall
text: I’m addicted to my Foot Detoxes, Far-Infared Saunas, and the Oxygen Bar!! Missy and Bobby are brilliant in their innovative designs and products! The staff is extremely knowledgeable and so incredibly friendly. If you don’t have a water 💦 ionizer you’re are missing out! Clean ionized water is everything to having Peak Health!

resp.text: Laura, we love your enthusiasm and commitment to health! Hope you’re enjoying the ionizer in your St Augustine condo as much as the one in your Malbis home!

name: Kelly Hanna (Big Sprout Media)
text: Peak Alkalinity  it’s truly an amazing place. The owners are so invested in what they do and the community that they serve. Missy and Bob always go the extra mile to make sure everyone is so well taken care of. They remember their customers they become family they genuinely care about your health and your well-being.  Their employees are also just as knowledgeable in helping you understand what an amazing difference drinking the right water can make.  I seriously suggest you check this place out number one for the amazing foot detox and sauna room, number two to fill up on some really high-quality water that will truly make a difference in your health, and number three seriously consider getting one of these units for your house.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kelly, for the amazing review!

name: Ross Sykes
text: The Peak Alkalinity team is a wealth of knowledge and you can feel their passion behind what they do. As a Peak customer I have enjoyed the journey that this product has made in my own life.  Everything this company represents is a Godsend and those not using this should.  Thank you Peak and I look forward to watching the change you make for many families.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Ross!

name: Joshua Hembree
text: Missy and her entire team at Peak Alkalinity are beyond excellent. I've struggled with heart burn my entire life and have bounced from one medication to the next because of it. However, after just a couple of weeks drinking their alkaline water I started to see improvements. I can't recommend them enough!

resp.text:
Josh, happy to have alleviated some of the pain associated with your acid reflux!
My dad had a similar issue, so I know that it can impact your quality of life. We appreciate the feedback!

name: Scott Blair (Scott the Wheelman)
text: Missy and her team have created an affordable water system that can help prevent many serious illnesses, including Cancer.  Everyone needs to have their Alkalinity System in their house.  I don't let my dog drink straight city water, much less my family.

resp.text: Thanks, Scott! I know that caring for your dog is what brought you to us. That’s a special bond. So happy that we could be of help!

name: sopheary huy
text: Missy is amazing, we will be back to get more educational information from her.

resp.text: Sopheary, excited to provide more education. Stop by anytime.

name: Deedra Harrison
text: The owner and staff at Peak Alkalinity Fairhope are very friendly and knowledgeable.  I enjoy the other services they provide and have started using the water in my neti pot.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Deedra! Yes, using the ionized acidic water in the Neti pot helps greatly during cold and flu season!

name: Emily Stuckey
text:
Peak Alkalinity helped me restore my health! Missy & Staff go above and beyond to explain the benefits of drinking the Ionized/Alkaline water along with a healthy diet. Since drinking the water I have more energy & mental clarity. I was also able to get a foot detox and have a sauna session, which along with the water boosted my energy level even more. So glad I stopped in, met Missy and jumped on the Alkaline water train! Thank you Peak Alkalinty!
-Emily Stuckey Sellers

resp.text: Emily, we have so enjoyed having you and the kids in regularly! We’re thrilled that you’ve noticed improvements. With your schedule, we know that you can use all the “boosting” you can get!

name: Heidi Will
text: What a unique business! Missy and her staff possess an impressive knowledge set backed by years of research, and are super nice, too! We enjoyed the detox foot bath and far-infrared sauna today, and of course refilled our reusable water bottles with their ionized alkaline water. Great way to learn about the numerous benefits of ionized water, and invest in your health.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Heidi! We really appreciate your kind words and look forward to talking to you soon!

name: jkdsdmf
text: Seems like alkaline water would help some people. Not particularly me though.  Knowledgeable and caring staff are two of the things you can expect when visiting this business.

resp.text: So sorry that your desired results weren’t experienced. If you’d like to come in and talk it through, we may be able to help alter the specifics of what’s needed to help. Thank you for coming in and for acknowledging our caring staff.

name: Barb Stassen
text: Everyone who works here is very helpful. It's always a pleasure to stop in.

resp.text: Barb, appreciate your kind words. We enjoy seeing you as well.

name: Maurice Morrisette
text: This is a company that genuinely cares for you. They're not there just to make a sell.

resp.text: Thank you, coach! That’s what we strive for! Good seeing you each week!

name: Tami Williams
text: Missy and the entire staff are extremely knowledgeable, helpful, friendly and caring.

resp.text: Tami, love having you in regularly. You did an excellent job in the vid! A star is born! 😁

name: carrie devolder-edwards
text: Everyone could benefit from Prak Alk services & different ph levels of water for everything in life. You are treated like family!

resp.text: Thanks, Carrie! We’re very blessed to have an “extended family” via our clientele. It’s an honor to help!

name: Eric Friese
text: I love Peak Alkalinity! I’ve struggled with acid reflux for so long. Drinking alkaline water from Peak Alkalinity helped that immediately. Missy and her staff are great!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and we are happy to have helped!

name: Glenda Turnbow
text: Had my first foot detox, last Saturday it was very informative.  I slept so good after my detox,  I haven't slept that good in years.  I wanted to wait a few days before I made a review, and I must say,  I have notice a little more energy this week, scheduling my next one now!

resp.text: Glenda, we are thrilled for you! Thank you so much for the great review and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Danielle Mccord
text: One of the nicest places clean neat and friendly service Emma is fantastic. Emma was a huge help in understanding the detox. Will most definitely going back.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Danielle for visiting us! We are thrilled that Emma was such a great help! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Sean Sullivan
text: Felt amazing after my foot detox and I love the alkaline water!

resp.text: Sean, thank you so much for wonderful review! Was happy to meet your Mom! She loved the foot detox that you purchased for her as well.

name: Greg Wall
text: Peak not only has great products that my family relies on daily but Peaks passion for their clients health and well being is why I will only purchase from Peak.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Greg! We’re stoked about having our products in CO!

name: Kameren Bowie
text: If you’re looking to detox and rid indigestion peak alkalinity is your place. Missy will take care you and is so energetic about getting you healthy.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kameren for your amazing review!

name: Sean McClay
text: Love the idea! Love the way they educate you about alkalinity.  Hoping to try the sauna soon.

resp.text: We are thrilled to hear this! Thank you so much, Sean, for the great review! We are looking forward to seeing you soon!

name: Ricky Louis
text: The owners  love what they do and love to help.

resp.text: Thank you Ricky! I'm glad you found us to be helpful!

name: Zachary Wilson
text: An amazing organization that puts people first and business second, helping people realize the importance of clean water and the amazing benefits ionization can have on the body.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Zachary. We love helping people in and out of our community as well as educating them on how they can maximize their health!

name: Donna Lucas
text: Make your body thrive with Peak Alkalinity!!!

resp.text: Thanks Donna! Happy to have had you in! 😊

name: David Rounsaville
text: Missy goes way over the top to explain how and why alkaline water is beneficial to the health! She knows her stuff!

resp.text: Thank you David for the great review!

name: Amber Granato
text: Customer service is always a priority at Peak! Thank you

resp.text: Thanks, Amber! That’s what we strive for!

name: Pete Canarela
text: Great products!!  Very helpful Staff!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Pete!
